title: Simulation-Based Mastery of Essential Neonatal Nursing Care

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary human anatomy knowledge and comprehension of medical terminology
context.additional_context: Modular learning design for working professionals, featuring 15-minute microlearning sessions held 2–3 times weekly.

learning_goals: Learners can perform WHO-recommended essential neonatal nursing procedures with 85% accuracy in a simulation environment.
Learners can establish appropriate primary assessments and intervention plans in high-risk neonatal case simulations.
Learners can achieve a score of 80 or above three times consecutively through assessment items provided in a mobile environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
